edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.queueapp

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.queueapp.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger utility. This class is designed to function in a static fashion, enabling it to be used throughout the simulation without needing to pass an instance around. However, this limits the usefulness of this class to an environment which uses exactly one log file.

    WARNING: Because the log file's PrintWriter is static, care must be taken to close() the logger or it is likely to get truncated.

    Note: You may use this class, with or without modification, in your Comp 2000, Queue application/Train Simulation solution. You must retain all authorship comments. If you modify this, add your authorship to mine.

    Version:
    1.1.0 track enhancement to Configuration, 1.0.0 initial version
    Author:
    David M Rosenberg

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create()
                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates and opens the log file TrainSimulation.log in the default location (root folder). If the file already exists, it is replaced.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - most likely cause is the file is open in another application

      • close

        public static void close()
        Closes the log file, releasing all allocated resources.

      • logConfiguration

        public static void logConfiguration(Configuration theConfiguration)
        Writes all of the configuration parameters into the log
        Parameters:
        theConfiguration - the configuration for this execution

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String logEntry)
        Appends the provided text to the log, including a terminating newline.
        Parameters:
        logEntry - the text to append to the log.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Unit test driver.
        Parameters:
        args - -unused-
        Throws:
